subject: Golf
John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The 19-year-old Jordan Spieth won the John Deere Classic, becoming the youngest winner on the Tour in 82 years and earning a spot in the British Open.
snippet: The 19-year-old Jordan Spieth won the John Deere Classic, becoming the youngest winner on the Tour in 82 years and earning a spot in the British Open.
